Name: ScooterFlow
About the game: The worldâ€™s most realistic freestyle scooter game is finally here. Ride the skatepark, hit the streets, boost the mega ramp, fully customize your scooter & throw down all of the real life trick combinations you could dream of within this physics based scooter game. Experience total freedom & utilize your imagination in a world where the possibilities are truly endless. Perform awesome tricks like tailwhips, rotorwhips, turndowns, no handers, bar spins, inverts, deck grabs, supermans, manuals, flips & flairs. FEATURES Realistic Physics: Simulate real-life riding with the physics system that's designed for you to flow naturally around the skateparks 4 Camera Angles: Choose to ride in first or third person perspectives Scooter Customization: Customize the style & colour of any part of your scooter & choose from a number of real brands! Save System: Save & load your custom-built scooters Character Customization: Easily cycle through 4 different preset clothing customization options with the press of a button Custom Maps: Download & play custom maps created by the community in our Discord This game requires a controller to play.
